description: Header file defining the class DobbySpecGenerator in the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. It declares methods for generating JSON specifications for runtime container configurations based on application configs and runtime settings. The class interfaces with JSON, logging, and various application and runtime configuration components.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating Dobby container specifications in JSON format based on application and runtime configurations for the WPEFramework plugin environment.

methods.name: DobbySpecGenerator
methods.description: Constructor for the DobbySpecGenerator class.

methods.name: ~DobbySpecGenerator
methods.description: Destructor for the DobbySpecGenerator class.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Generates a JSON specification string based on provided application configuration and runtime settings.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates environment variable JSON object based on configuration.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates mount points JSON object based on configuration.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates RDK plugins JSON object based on configuration.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates Minidump plugin configuration JSON object.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates application service SDK plugin JSON configuration.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates network plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a JSON object for a bind mount with source, destination, and options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines whether GPU should be enabled based on configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves system memory limit for container.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves GPU memory limit.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU is enabled in configuration.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Returns a string representation of CPU cores to be allocated.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates JSON with classic plugin configurations.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ethan Log plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates Multicast Socket plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ion Memory plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates Thunder plugin configuration JSON based on application configuration.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates OpenCDM plugin configuration JSON.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates private data mount configuration JSON.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates FKPS mounts configuration within specifications.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates a temporary filesystem mount JSON.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates resource manager mount JSON.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Retrieves the working directory setting JSON.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps JSON data.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes URLs for plugin creation.
